articles.title: Trump address a cliffhanger for a TV-centric presidency

articles.content:

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: New DA drops old shoplifting charge in commuted lifer's case
articles.description: A newly elected prosecutor has dropped an old shoplifting charge that complicated the release of a Philadelphia man granted clemency from a life sentence
articles.content:
MEDIA, Pa. -- 
A newly elected prosecutor has dropped an old shoplifting charge that complicated the release of a Philadelphia man granted clemency from a life sentence.
The case had become a political football among rival prosecutors as the nation debates … [+962 chars]

articles.title: Case of 2 missing kids grows to include deaths, cult rumors
articles.description: Confusion is growing around a series of mysterious deaths and the disappearances of a 7-year-old boy and 17-year-old girl that tie back to a couple who have since vanished themselves
articles.content:

articles.title: World Bank sees modest global 2020 rebound but trade a risk
articles.description: The World Bank says the global economy should see a modest rebound in growth this year
articles.content:
WASHINGTON -- 
The World Bank says the global economy should see a modest rebound in growth this year.
